description.value:
Activate f (concentrate)

Trigger You fail or critically fail a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Coerce], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Lie], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Request]

Requirements You're a master in the skill you failed with.

This ornate locket, usually containing a faceless, humanoid portrait, is typically worn on a chain around the neck or attached to your clothing. When activated, the charm casts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rewrite Memory] spell (@Check[will|dc:26|traits:mental,spell]) against a single target of the check, removing all memory of your failed attempt and potentially allowing you to make another attempt. The effect can't remove more than 3 minutes of memories from its target.
